thread.title: BRIEF-Stewart Information Services Says Stewart Will Be Obligated To Pay Termination Fee Of $33 Mln To FNF If Merger Terminated Due To Stewart’s Board

title: BRIEF-Stewart Information Services Says Stewart Will Be Obligated To Pay Termination Fee Of $33 Mln To FNF If Merger Terminated Due To Stewart’s Board
text: Market News March 19, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Stewart Information Services Says Stewart Will Be Obligated To Pay Termination Fee Of $33 Mln To FNF If Merger Terminated Due To Stewart’s Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - Fidelity National Financial Inc : * STEWART INFORMATION SERVICES SAYS STEWART WILL BE OBLIGATED TO PAY TERMINATION FEE OF $33 MILLION TO FNF IF MERGER TERMINATED DUE TO STEWART’S BOARD Source text: ( bit.ly/2pkppYP ) Further company coverage:
